text: Taynen mab bog wɨdɨn nep pak yu gɨl mɨdeb ak nɨŋɨd agɨl mel, namam tap achɨp wɨdɨn nop mɨdeb anop nɨŋɨd apan agak? Tɨtay dɨl anɨb apan, Tap achɨp wɨdɨn alaŋ mɨdeb, yad dɨyokin apan agak? Nad bɨ tay yepɨs apan agak. Nɨgan. Mab bog wɨdɨn nep pak yu gɨl mɨdeb agak. Nad ned mab bog ak wɨdɨn nak alaŋ mɨdeb anɨb ak dɨyoke, wɨdɨn nep suŋ lek nɨgtep gɨl tek, kɨdek namam tap achɨp mɨdeb ak dɨyokɨnɨmɨn agak.
